content: पर्याप्ति {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Obtaining, acquisition. {@--2@} End, conclusion, close. {@--3@} Enough, fulness, sufficiency. {@--4@} Satiety, satisfaction. {@--5@} Preserving, guarding, warding off a blow. {@--6@} Fitness, competency. {@--7@} Willingness, readiness {@--8@} Distinction of objects according to their natural properties.
